topic.title: Network Architecture
topic.shortdesc: The Dell Red Hat cloud solutions with RHEL OpenStack Platform use Dell Force10 S55 1/10-Gigabit and/or Dell Force10 S4810 10-Gigabit Ethernet switches as the top-of-rack connectivity to all OpenStack-related nodes. This Reference Architecture is used to support consistency in rapid deployments through the minimal differences in the network configuration.
